title: This Month's GTA+ Benefits
headline: This Month's GTA+ Benefits
subtitle: GTA+
content:
In addition to the recurring monthly GTA$500,000 deposited directly into your Maze Bank account, GTA+ Members who've signed up for this month (April 3 - 30) will also receive:

— The Bollokan Envisage (Sports)
— 50% off Biker Businesses and free Biker Business Supplies
— 2X GTA$ and RP on Short Trips
— 2X GTA$ and RP on Acid Lab Sell Missions
— The LD Organics 420 Hockey Jersey and Cap
— And more

Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel anytime. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
